value:
I see there are all manner of frozen
treats here, and they look delicious...
Would it be all right to try one?

My travels with my lord Ike taught me
that being able to swim is vitally
important when battling on the ocean.

This attire feels so comfortable and
refreshing. I must remember to give
$Nu my thanks...

The sun's rays are strong, but they
aren't at all unpleasant. If anything,
I feel quite comfortable.

I've seen so many fruits and fish that
can't be found in Crimea. They've
made for wonderful souvenirs.

I am Queen Elincia of Crimea. I've
been tasked with delivering summer
tidings from $Nf.

I will try my utmost to bring as much
light and comfort to Crimea as the
tropical sun does here.

I would love for the people of Crimea
to one day also know the warmth of
the tropical sun.

S-sorry! The waves were far taller
than I had anticipated...

Is this a summer gift? Thank you,
I'll make sure to take good care of it.

I am Elincia, Queen of Crimea. Oh,
but I'm here simply as a sightseer
eager to relax on a tropical island!

Thank you so much for showing me
such a lovely place.$k$pAs queen of Crimea, I have spent
countless hours thinking about what
I can do to bring my people joy.$k$pHowever, it seems that I had become
exhausted in both body and mind
without even realizing it.$k$pThis tropical island made me see that.
But now, I feel as if the waves and
the gentle wind have healed me.$k$pYes, I am all right now. Beginning
tomorrow, I can step forward once
more, with confidence, as queen.$k$pI will build a bright future for Crimea,
while filling my heart with all the
happiness this summer has given me.
はあっ
どうです？
きゃあっ
溺れてしまう…
Let's go for a swim.
I'll pull you under.
Radiant, isn't it?
Come play in the water.
The waves are too strong...
*Giggle*
Do you think this swimsuit looks all right on me? Is it ostentatious?
Nyah! Oh, a drink. How refreshing. Thank you.
I've never gone swimming in tropical waters before. What a wonderful new experience.
I found a little crab. Look, isn't it cute?
Swimming makes me so hungry. Is it bold of me to ask if there's anything to eat?
What a wonderful break... It's like a beautiful dream of peace.
Let's walk along the beach and watch the sunset. I'm sure it will be beautiful.
Of course.
I have an idea…
A swim sounds nice.
